item.title: Megan add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Megan add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Megan add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I don't know half of you half as well as I should like; and I like less than half of you half as well as you deserve." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Megan add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "Genius is one percent inspiration, ninety-nine percent perspiration." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Megan add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "Negative results are just what I want. They’re just as valuable to me as positive results. I can never find the thing that does the job best until I find the ones that don’t." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Megan add a quote by Thomas Carlyle
item.description: "The block of granite which was an obstacle in the pathway of the weak becomes a stepping-stone in the pathway of the strong." -- Thomas Carlyle

item.title: Megan add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen
